page.title: 11Changing Times.
page.content: The greatest change in the last 30 years has been the result of growing population and increased wealth.Large housing estates,private and municipal have surrounded the old town whilst many of the medieval buildings have been demolished.The car has prompted the building of big car parks;shopping habits have changed from small local shops to big supermarkets & multiples whilst the extension of the outside market to Wednesday as well,has been welcomed.This was helped by the pedestrian precinct in the town centre being formed so that the stalls went back to their original place in the road.With the increase in spare time & the proliferation of T.V.s has come a change in leisure activities.Cinemas have closed or changed to bingo clubs,whilst societies and amenity groups have increased.
